articles.title: Coronavirus LIVE: India Logs 2,706 New Covid Cases, 25 Deaths In A Day
articles.description: India on Monday reported at least 2,706 new coronavirus infections, bringing the total number of COVID-19 cases to 4,31,55,749. The active cases also increased to 17,698 in the last 24 hours, according to the Union Health Ministry data.
articles.content:

articles.title: EU Agrees To Send 9 Billion Euros To Ukraine In Immediate Liquidity
articles.description: European Union leaders meeting in Brussels have agreed to send Ukraine nine billion euros to support its economy in the face of Russia's invasion, EU chief Charles Michel announced Monday.
articles.content:
EU leaders also agreed to ban on more than 2/3 Russian oil imports to punish Moscow.
